mapper.select: /* findListRoleMenuWithMenuFunc */ SELECT MM.PAR_MENU_CD , MM.TEN_ID , MM.MENU_CD , MM.USR_TYP_CCD , MM.MENU_SORT , CASE WHEN MLANG.MENU_NM IS NULL THEN MM.ACT_NM ELSE MLANG.MENU_NM END MENU_NM , MLANG.LANG_CCD , MLANG.MENU_CD AS ML_MENU_CD , RMENU.ROLE_CD , CASE WHEN RACT.ACT_CD IS NULL OR RACT.ACT_CD = '' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS USE_YN , MM.ACT_CD FROM ( SELECT MN.PAR_MENU_CD , MN.TEN_ID , MN.MENU_CD , MN.USR_TYP_CCD , MN.MENU_SORT , '' AS ACT_NM , '' AS ACT_CD , MN.USE_YN , MN.STS , #{p.role_cd} AS ROLE_CD FROM MENU MN WHERE MN.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND MN.USR_TYP_CCD = #{p.usr_typ_ccd} AND MN.STS != 'D' AND MN.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT MA.MENU_CD AS PAR_MENU_CD , MA.TEN_ID , CONCAT(MA.MENU_CD, MA.ACT_CD) AS MENU_CD , #{p.usr_typ_ccd} AS USR_TYP_CCD , 0 AS MENU_SORT , MA.ACT_NM , MA.ACT_CD AS ACT_CD , 'Y' AS USE_YN , 'C' AS STS , #{p.role_cd} AS ROLE_CD FROM MENU_ACT MA ) MM LEFT OUTER JOIN MENU_MULTLANG MLANG ON MM.TEN_ID = MLANG.TEN_ID AND MM.MENU_CD = MLANG.MENU_CD AND MLANG.LANG_CCD = #{p.lang_ccd} LEFT OUTER JOIN ROLE_MENU RMENU ON MM.TEN_ID = RMENU.TEN_ID AND MM.MENU_CD = RMENU.MENU_CD AND RMENU.ROLE_CD = #{p.role_cd} LEFT OUTER JOIN ROLE_ACT RACT ON MM.TEN_ID = RACT.TEN_ID AND MM.PAR_MENU_CD = RACT.MENU_CD AND MM.ROLE_CD = RACT.ROLE_CD AND MM.ACT_CD = RACT.ACT_CD WHERE MM.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND MM.USR_TYP_CCD = #{p.usr_typ_ccd} AND MM.STS != 'D' AND MM.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MM.MENU_SORT

/* role.findListMenuFuncRole: 기능코드 맵핑된 롤 조회 */ SELECT RH.ROLE_CD ,RH.ROLE_NM ,(CASE WHEN RF.ACT_CD IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS USE_YN ,RF.MENU_CD FROM ROLE RH LEFT OUTER JOIN ROLE_ACT RF ON RF.TEN_ID = RH.TEN_ID AND RF.ROLE_CD = RH.ROLE_CD AND RF.MENU_CD = #{p.menu_cd} AND RF.ACT_CD = #{p.act_cd} WHERE RH.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND RH.USE_YN = 'Y' AND RH.STS != 'D'
